amendment.description: To direct the Attorney General to increase the amount provided under certain formula grants to States that have in place laws that terminate the parental rights of men who father children through rape.

vote.text: Amendment SA 311, under the order of 4/21/2015, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 160.

action.text: Amendment SA 311 proposed by Senator Brown. (consideration: CR S2331-2332; text: CR S2331-2332) To direct the Attorney General to increase the amount provided under certain formula grants to States that have in place laws that terminate the parental rights of men who father children through rape.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 311 proposed by Senator Brown.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 311, under the order of 4/21/2015, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 160.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 311, under the order of 4/21/2015, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 160.
